name: What suspension of disbelief???
reviewBody: I think that you should accept that you've suspended objectivity and been pandering to whatever the mainstream secular 'science' dogma is at the present time. The larger point of the film is not thats there's a ID and a God, but that PURE scientific and rational pursuits of research are being oppressed and suppressed by a new crop of secular elitists. And that is a fact....not a theory. To listen to your contrarian counterpoints is to hear nothing more than snide detractions rather than denial of the above facts. Obviously none of these 'science snobs' are able to sustain a withering critique of their positions and their powerful and oppressive regimes. Let's see what these anarchical anti-God scientific Torquemada's can 'cook' up to meet the scathing criticism from this expose' of their nonsensical counterpoints. I hope Mel Brooks does a movie exposing them as well.
